OOC: Dont worry about it Predaking, even if it dosent work,

BIC:
"He will, not stop me" Megatron speaks, through hoarse rasps, as he strains
to stand, he shakes through the pain, but he was already weak from being
reborn, and colapses. "Show youre loyalty Predaking, hhhhhhuhhhh, take me
to an energy source, and refule me, my scanners, cough*, sense a heavy
source of fuel at  coordinates 75434 (in arctics)" he then colapses to his
stomach, barely able to move.
